entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 04:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.8°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -37.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
